Travel Guide & Tips рокропрог ро╡ро┤ро┐роХро╛роЯрпНроЯро┐ & роХрпБро▒ро┐рокрпНрокрпБроХро│рпН

History & Significance ро╡ро░ро▓ро╛ро▒рпБ & роЪро┐ро▒рокрпНрокрпБ

Rameswaram is one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites. It is where Lord Rama built a bridge (Ram Setu) to Lanka. The Ramanathaswamy Temple is famous for its long corridors and 22 sacred wells (Theerthams). Rameswaram is one of the Char Dham pilgrimage sites. It is where Lord Rama built a bridge (Ram Setu) to Lanka. The Ramanathaswamy Temple is famous for its long corridors and 22 sacred wells (Theerthams).

Darshan Timings родро░ро┐роЪрой роирпЗро░роЩрпНроХро│рпН

5:00 AM тАУ 1:00 PM & 3:00 PM тАУ 9:00 PM 5:00 AM тАУ 1:00 PM & 3:00 PM тАУ 9:00 PM

Dress Code роЖроЯрпИ роХроЯрпНроЯрпБрокрпНрокро╛роЯрпБ

Traditional wear. Wet clothes are allowed after Theertham bath. Traditional wear. Wet clothes are allowed after Theertham bath.

Pro Tips for First-Timers роорпБроХрпНроХро┐роп роХрпБро▒ро┐рокрпНрокрпБроХро│рпН

  • Start with Agni Theertham (Sea Bath) first.
  • Proceed to 22 Wells Bath inside the temple (Ticket required).
  • Visit Dhanushkodi (Ghost Town) early morning.
  • Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Memorial is a must-visit.
  • Start with Agni Theertham (Sea Bath) first.
  • Proceed to 22 Wells Bath inside the temple (Ticket required).
  • Visit Dhanushkodi (Ghost Town) early morning.
  • Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Memorial is a must-visit.
